    • Method Detail

      • onFinishInflate

        protected void onFinishInflate()

      • lockDrawerOnSwipe

        public void lockDrawerOnSwipe()
        The drawer is locked closed. The user may not open it, though the app may open it programmatically. The lock is done on all gravities.

      • unlockDrawer

        public void unlockDrawer()
        The drawer is unlocked. The lock is undone on all gravities.

      • setDrawerPlusListener

        public void setDrawerPlusListener(DrawerPlusListener drawerPlusListener)
        Define a reference using a DrawerPlusListener, to follow the opening and closing state of the menu.
        Parameters:
        drawerPlusListener - a reference to a DrawerPlusListener.
